channel.title: Battlescape Client urgent help needed!
channel.description:
Urgent Help is needed with this !!
[QUOTE]cache.zip 8728004 Finished downloading cache.zip! Error: loaderror Finished downloading cache.zip! 35 java.lang.NullPointerException at Stream.read3Bytes(Stream.java:155) at StreamLoader.a(StreamLoader.java:14) at StreamLoader.<init>(StreamLoader.java:8) at client.streamLoaderForName(client.java:4229) at client.startUp(client.java:8499) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:64) at client.run(client.java:5300) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/QUOTE]
I get that error basicly when the cache is downloaded
